Explanation Of Layouts and why they were used.
1.The main activity uses a TabLayout with viewPager , the viewPager holds the 3 tabs and allows navigation in the TabLayout. I used it to create 3 tabs in a single activity each containing a separate fragment.
2.The images fragment layout uses a recyclerView with a custom Grid Layout. The recycler view was used as a large number of photos had to be displayed and it was combined with a custom Gridview to display the images in a grid fashion and manipulate their size to fit the grid item.
3.The spinner layout only uses 2 spinners placed in the center.
4.The movies layout also uses the custom made gridView used in images layout for displaying movie posters in 2 columns grid pattern.
5.The movie detail layout contains a combination of linear layout with horizontal and vertical orientation and scrollView to position the title,poster,description,rating and realease date of the movie properly and also removes the chance of movie description getting cut off if it is too big with the help of its scrollview.
